    • Class org.bremersee.comparator.model.SortOrderItem

      class SortOrderItem extends Object implements Serializable
      serialVersionUID:
      1L

      • Serialized Fields

        • caseHandling
          SortOrderItem.CaseHandling caseHandling
          The case-handling. Default is SortOrderItem.CaseHandling.INSENSITIVE.
        • direction
          SortOrderItem.Direction direction
          The direction. Default is SortOrderItem.Direction.ASC.
        • field
          String field
          The field name or path. If it is null, the whole object will be compared.
        • nullHandling
          SortOrderItem.NullHandling nullHandling
          The null-handling. Default is SortOrderItem.NullHandling.NATIVE.
